summary: A young man from north Italy named Amedeo decides to come to Rome.He has a crazy idea in his head to meet the pope.
cast: Enzo Jannacci|Claudia Cardinale|Ugo Tognazzi|Michel Piccoli|Vittorio Gassman|Alain Cuny|Daniele Dublino|Sigelfrido Rossi|Irena Oberberg|Maalerer Bergier|Dante Cleri|Luigi Scavran|Giuseppe Ravenna|Mario Jannilli|Enzo Mondino|Attilio Pelegatti|Bruno Bertocci|Enrico Bergier|Jean Blondel|Nestore Cavaricci|Pope John XXIII|Pope Paul VI
title: La audiencia
